'Cis' () is a [[Communes of Trentino|comune]] (municipality) in Trentino in the
northern Italian region Trentino-Alto Adige/SÃ¼dtirol, located about 40 km
northwest of Trento. As of 31 December 2004, it had a population of 311 and an
area of 5.5 kmÂ². All demographics and other statistics:
Italian statistical institute Istat.

Cis borders the following municipalities: Bresimo, Livo, Caldes, and Cles.
